data.title: Excellent
data.text: Great cookies! We use cookies by design for every family get together. Cookies are very creative and taste amazing.

data.title: Cookies for all
data.text: Since living in Rochester Hills, Cookies by Design has always been a great place to go and get some fancy and very happy cookies.  We received a couple huge cookie baskets when we first moved here from neighbors, welcoming us to the neighborhood.  The designs are bright, colorful and specific to any occasion you need.  You can even stop by and pick up one big wonderful cookie to brighten your day (or your child's !)

data.title: A yummy place hidden in the back of a shopping center.
data.text: Just recently redecorated, this place offers a wide variety of yummy cookies.  The prices are higher than the grocery store but the quality of the cookies are so much better.
